ActionSequence.ItemUID: loading objects associated with element name

InsertValue.Value: from dashboarddef select uid_dialogdashboarddef where ident_dialogdashboarddef = (select current displayname from dashboardinfo)
objectwalker( from dashboardinfo select current ElementNameColumnRef)

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: IsNullOrEmpty( from dashboardinfo select current clickmode,"NoClick")

GridBand.WhereClause: key in ( select elementobjectkey from dashboardcontent where uid_dialogdashboarddef = ( select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboarddef))

Label.Text: from referencedobjects select top 1 DisplayLong() where key = ( from dashboardcontent select current elementobjectkey)

translate("#LDS#Filter by")+": "+(from Dashboardinfo select top 1 ( datacaption(ElementNameCollectionRef+"", ElementNameColumnRef+"")) where DisplayName= (select current ident_dialogdashboarddef from dashboarddef))

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: select Count() from Elementnames where IsActive

Column.Name: ElementNameDisplay

DataTableView.ViewExpression:
union(
-- 1. collect aggregated content select distinct (uid_dialogdashboarddef, elementname, '' as ElementObjectKey, historynumber, elementdate, '' as elementtooltip) from dashboardcontent where uid_dialogdashboarddef in (select uid_dialogdashboarddef from DashboardDef where isnull(aggregatefunction,'')<>'') and not(isinactive) and not (uid_dialogdashboarddef in (select uid_dialogdashboarddef from DashboardDef where (ident_dialogdashboarddef in select displayname from dashboardinfo where SumByElementName))) ,
-- 2. collect non-aggregated content select distinct (uid_dialogdashboarddef, elementname, elementobjectkey, historynumber, elementdate, elementtooltip) from dashboardcontent where uid_dialogdashboarddef in (select uid_dialogdashboarddef from DashboardDef where isnull(aggregatefunction,'')='') and not(isinactive) and not (uid_dialogdashboarddef in (select uid_dialogdashboarddef from DashboardDef where (ident_dialogdashboarddef in select displayname from dashboardinfo where SumByElementName)))
, -- 3. SumByElementName select distinct (uid_dialogdashboarddef, translate('#LDS#Sum'), elementobjectkey, historynumber, elementdate,'' as elementtooltip) from dashboardcontent where uid_dialogdashboarddef in (select uid_dialogdashboarddef from DashboardDef where (ident_dialogdashboarddef in select displayname from dashboardinfo where SumByElementName)) and not(isinactive)
)

Column.Name: elementvalue
Column.Expression:
-- SUM if( from DashboardDef select (AggregateFunction='SUM') where UID_DialogDashBoardDef = ( select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg)) then
(from dashboardcontent select sum(elementvalue) where (not(isinactive) and elementname = ( select current elementname from DashboardContentAgg) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg)))
-- AVG else if( from DashboardDef select (AggregateFunction='AVG') where UID_DialogDashBoardDef = ( select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg)) then
(from dashboardcontent select avg(elementvalue) where (not(isinactive) and elementname = ( select current elementname from DashboardContentAgg) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg)))
-- SumByElementName else if ( select top 1 SumByElementName from dashboardinfo where displayname= ( select ident_dialogdashboarddef from DashboardDef where uid_dialogdashboarddef= (select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboardcontentagg))) then
(from dashboardcontent select sum(elementvalue) where (not(isinactive) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg) and elementobjectkey=(select current elementobjectkey from dashboardcontentagg) and historynumber= (select current historynumber from dashboardcontentagg) and not(elementname in ( -- filter by element name select elementname from ElementNames where (not(isactive) and uid_dialogdashboarddef = (select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboardcontentagg)) ))))
else -- no aggregate function
(from dashboardcontent select top 1 (elementvalue) where (not(isinactive) and elementname = ( select current elementname from DashboardContentAgg) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg) and elementobjectkey=(select current elementobjectkey from dashboardcontentagg) and historynumber = ( select current historynumber from dashboardcontentagg)))

Column.Name: elementvalue100
Column.Expression:
if( from DashboardDef select (AggregateFunction100='SUM') where UID_DialogDashBoardDef = ( select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg)) then
(from dashboardcontent select sum(elementvalue100) where (not(isinactive) and elementname = ( select current elementname from DashboardContentAgg) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg)))
else if( from DashboardDef select (AggregateFunction100='AVG') where UID_DialogDashBoardDef = ( select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg)) then
(from dashboardcontent select avg(elementvalue100) where (not(isinactive) and elementname = ( select current elementname from DashboardContentAgg) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg) ))
else
(from dashboardcontent select top 1 elementvalue100 where (not(isinactive) and elementname = ( select current elementname from DashboardContentAgg) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg) and elementobjectkey=(select current elementobjectkey from dashboardcontentagg)))

Column.Name: ElementNameDisplay
Column.Expression: from DashboardContent select top 1 translatecolumn(elementname, "dialogdashboardcontent", "elementname") where uid_dialogdashboarddef = ( select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboardcontentagg) and elementname = ( select current elementname from dashboardcontentagg)

Column.Name: ElementOrder
Column.Expression:
from DashboardContent select top 1 elementorder where UID_DialogDashBoardDef = ( select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboardcontentagg) and (elementname = ( select current elementname from dashboardcontentagg) or from DashboardInfo select SumByElementName where displayname = (from DashboardDef select ident_dialogdashboarddef where uid_dialogdashboarddef=(from DashboardContentAgg select current uid_dialogdashboarddef)))
-- ElementOrder across groups

Column.Name: ElementOrderGroup
Column.Expression:
isnull( from DashboardContent select top 1 elementorder where UID_DialogDashBoardDef = ( select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboardcontentagg) and (elementname = ( select current elementname from dashboardcontentagg) or from DashboardInfo select SumByElementName where displayname = (from DashboardDef select ident_dialogdashboarddef where uid_dialogdashboarddef=(from DashboardContentAgg select current uid_dialogdashboarddef)))
and (if(select current isnullorempty(elementobjectkey) from dashboardcontentagg) then true else elementobjectkey = ( select current elementobjectkey from dashboardcontentagg)), 0)
-- Element order for each group

Column.Name: ElementObjectKeyNavigation
Column.Expression: isnullorempty(from DashboardContentAgg select current ElementObjectKey, from DashboardContent select top 1 elementobjectkey where uid_dialogdashboarddef = ( select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboardcontentagg) and elementname = ( select current elementname from dashboardcontentagg))

Column.Name: ElementValueHistoric
Column.Expression: from dashboardcontent select top 1 (elementvaluehistoric) where (not(isinactive) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg) )

Column.Name: HasHistoricValue
Column.Expression: (from dashboardcontent select top 1 (hashistoricvalue) where not(isinactive) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg) and historynumber = ( select current historynumber from dashboardcontentagg))

Column.Name: HistoricValueDate
Column.Expression: (from dashboardcontent select top 1 (historicvaluedate) where (not(isinactive) and uid_dialogdashboarddef=(select current UID_DialogDashBoardDef from dashboardcontentagg) and historynumber = ( select current historynumber from dashboardcontentagg)))

Column.Name: ObjectDisplay

DataTableView.ViewExpression: select distinct (elementname, uid_dialogdashboarddef) from dashboardcontent where uid_dialogdashboarddef in ( from DashboardDef select UID_DialogDashboarddef)

Column.Name: ElementNameDisplay
ident_dialogdashboarddef
Column.Expression: select ident_dialogdashboarddef from dashboarddef where uid_dialogdashboarddef= ( select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from ElementNames)
